slide.title: Redis: Sets
slide.example: 127.0.0.1:6379> SADD whisky:glenfiddich-12:tags fruity (integer) 1 127.0.0.1:6379> SADD whisky:glenfiddich-12:tags vanilla (integer) 1 127.0.0.1:6379> SADD whisky:glenfiddich-12:tags fruity (integer) 0 127.0.0.1:6379> SADD whisky:glenfiddich-12:tags "medium long finish" (integer) 1 127.0.0.1:6379> SISMEMBER whisky:glenfiddich-12:tags peaty (integer) 0 127.0.0.1:6379> SMEMBERS whisky:glenfiddich-12:tags 1) "medium long finish" 2) "vanilla" 3) "fruity"
